subject: Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: With a win over Penn, the Tigers set up a one-game playoff against Harvard on Saturday to decide which team gets the league’s automatic N.C.A.A. tournament invitation.
snippet: With a win over Penn, the Tigers set up a one-game playoff against Harvard on Saturday to decide which team gets the league’s automatic N.C.A.A. tournament invitation.
